general.byline: Senior Product Designer in Bristol, UK, He/him
general.about: Senior product designer with a keen eye for visual design. Over 8 years experience delivering effective software with users, business leaders, designers and engineers in mission-led B2B and B2C companies. Enjoys challenges and seeks learning opportunities. Interested in nature and the universe, architecture, evolutionary biology, language and etymologies, cooking, veganism, and travel.

projects.heading: Tuning the Test Kit at Genomics plc
projects.description: We defined a new online sample identification system for our genetic test kit, boosting successful use by 4.7%.
projects.title: Tuning the Test Kit

projects.heading: A New Home for Gardens at Candide
projects.description: We refreshed the home page in March 2022, turning it into a destination and improving bounce rate by -5%.
projects.title: A New Home for Gardens

projects.heading: The Gift of Gardens at Candide
projects.description: We launched a garden membership gifting service, driving £32k revenue over Xmas 2021 and 13 new clients.
projects.title: The Gift of Gardens

projects.heading: Time Slots at Candide
projects.description: We optimised visitor date selection and added time slots to help gardens manage crowds.
projects.title: Time Slots

projects.heading: Tap & Ride at Masabi
projects.description: We developed an account based ticketing system (think Oyster across cities) for ticketless travel.
projects.title: Tap & Ride

projects.heading: Mobility as a Service at Masabi
projects.description: We built a way to use our tech in partner apps, driving ticket sales for our client by 39.2% and Uber trips in Denver starting or ending at a transport station by 11.6%.
projects.title: Mobility as a Service

writing.heading: How to edit microcopy
writing.description: A short guide to the mightiest text.
writing.title: How to edit microcopy

workExperience.heading: Senior Product Designer at Genomics plc
workExperience.description:
Testing service for genetic predisposition to disease

* Co-designed genetic testing service that exceeded sign up target by 40% in first month

* Led creative test kit physical packaging designs under US health regulations

* Planned, gathered and synthesised user research to guide business decisions including product name

* Contributed to and maintained a design system including large copy set

* Presented company-wide design process talks to drive organisation design maturity
workExperience.title: Senior Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at Candide
workExperience.description:
Digitising garden visitation businesses to drive revenue

* Led design of multi-platform services for garden visitation firms and their customers

* Defined ticketing and attraction services for visitors aged 65+ with low digital skills

* Ran stakeholder workshops presenting journey maps and other artefacts

* Contributed to and maintained a design system

* Balanced multiple project needs in a high pressure start up environment
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Freelance Product Designer at OBD
workExperience.description: Product design consultation services for local businesses. Designed end-to-end experiences via affordable fixed project pricing model.
workExperience.title: Freelance Product Designer

workExperience.heading: Product Designer at Masabi
workExperience.description:
Global transport fare collection SaaS platform

* Led end-to-end design of iOS, Android and web platforms serving millions of users

* Delivered new features and data-led iterations with engineers across teams

* Worked with Uber and Google design teams

* Wrote production CSS for new client app

* Led switch to Figma to support US team collaboration and defined design system
workExperience.title: Product Designer

workExperience.heading: UI/UX Designer at NewDay
workExperience.description:
Affordable credit finance

* Defined web experiences for 10+ brands receiving 10m total sessions a year

* Owned optimisation efforts with iterative testing

* Cut delivery time with introduction of design system documentation

* Developed on own initiative an acronym web search to ease new hire onboarding

* Managed additional stakeholder responsibility on exit of senior designer colleague
workExperience.title: UI/UX Designer

workExperience.heading: Motion Graphics Designer at Gramercy Park Studios
workExperience.description:
Global media production

* Assisted in motion graphics production for TV, from SU2C overlays to 3D intro segments

* Input on graphic design projects

* Leveraged professional Cinema 4D to After Effects workflows
workExperience.title: Motion Graphics Designer

volunteering.heading: Helpline Volunteer at British Stammering Association
volunteering.description: Provided emotional and practical support for people directly or indirectly (parents) affected by stammering. Assured people it is manageable, inspires empathy and teaches you how to deal with fear.
volunteering.title: Helpline Volunteer

volunteering.heading: Design Consultant at Bristol Palestine Film Festival
volunteering.description: Advised on mixed media from web design to print on an adhoc basis.
volunteering.title: Design Consultant

volunteering.heading: Fundraiser at Medical Aid for Palestinians
volunteering.description: Cycled through the West Bank in Palestine for 10 days to raise money for Medical Aid for Palestinians (MAP). MAP provides life-saving medical care to Palestinians affected by the Israeli occupation.
volunteering.title: Fundraiser

education.heading: Digital Media Production at Arts University Bournemouth
education.description: Specialised in UX/UI and animation from a range of media. Created a physical smartphone prototype and concept OS for final major project.

education.heading: Foundation Diploma, Graphic Design at Arts University Bournemouth

certifications.heading: d.MBA from d.MBA
certifications.description: Learned and applied business fundamentals in this 6-week business design course. Topics included Business Empathy, Business Strategy (Strategic Goals, Strategic Places, Strategic Activities), Business Models, Prototyping with Numbers, Business and Design Metrics.
certifications.name: d.MBA

certifications.heading: Service Design Masterclass from Royal College of Art
certifications.description: Added to service design skills in this week course with Clive Grinyer.
certifications.name: Service Design Masterclass

certifications.heading: UX Certification from Nielsen Norman Group
certifications.description: Certified UX knowledge with distinctions in exams in this week intensive. Courses included Discoveries, Ideation Techniques for UX Design, Emerging Patterns in UI Design, Lean UX and Agile, UI Principles Designers Must Know, and UX Deliverables.
certifications.name: UX Certification

certifications.heading: Freelance Website Development from Codecademy
certifications.description: Learned HTML/CSS and built several small websites.
certifications.name: Freelance Website Development
